name: kingston thick & thin merino sweater (shown in Nebula)
description:
kingston is the quintessential sweater, it is of a seamless design  in a classic  minimalist style, in a cozy & easy to wear body, with   modernity in a distinctive cropped sleeve.

◊ entirely hand knit & hand worked, each piece is one of a kind 
◊ limited edition item & original design
◊  fair trade  thick & thin hand spun merino wool sourced from Uruguay, naturally hand dyed

available hand dyed colours ways, each skein is unique: 

Midnight     (true midnight denim blue)
Bright Night     (midnight + burnt orange)
Nebula     (grey + orange + midnight + teal)
Carnival     (minty blues + minty green + minty plum)
Dark Sky     (bold blue + light blue + teal blue)


*colour availability is always limited & may be discontinued at any time


fits xs, small, medium (one size)
measures approx.
chest (from armpit to armpit):
38 inches around


entirely hand knit by tara-lynn in canada

photos: arden wray
http://arden wray.com

model: kate campbell
clothing provided by robber



all designs & patterns are original to ©good night, day

name: as seen in Frankie #54  "good night, day : modern & minimalist knitting patterns" volume 1 & 2
description: AS FEATURED IN FRANKIE magazine #54 "good night, day : modern & minimalist knitting patterns" seamless knitting patterns from the gnd collection by tara-lynn morrison vol 1 & 2 ◊ volume #1 includes collection of good night day's signature knitting patterns; markham loop collar, welland sweater, simcoe cable braided headband, pembroke tank top, elora toque, leeds halter top & meaford cowl ◊volume #2 includes collection of good night day's signature knitting patterns; kingston sweater, petawawa toque, belleville shawl, windsor turbans, jarvis fisherman toque, aurora reversible cable braided cowl, perth dress ◊ soft cover booklet, 21.5cm X 13.5cm / 8.5" X 5.5" ◊ printed and self-published locally in Canada ◊ 24 pages, 23 colour photos, ◊ seamless knitting techniques, customization tips, & convenient blank notes pages ◊ limited individually hand packed in limited run packaging The good night, day patterns in this booklet are all cleverly designed to be knit in one seamless piece or in sections that can be easily pieced together without seaming, using a range of straight forward knitting techniques and apt tools. photos: arden wray http://ardenwray.com model: elspeth hudson © 2013 tara-lynn morrison & good night, day all rights reserved. reproduction in whole or any part of all material, including photos, in this booklet is strictly forbidden. the patterns/designs in this booklet are copyrighted and must not be knitted for re-sale. reproduction of this publication is protected by copyright and is sold in the condition that it is used for non commercial purposes.

name: belleville shawl/cowl of thick & thin spun wool (shown in variegated grey)
description:
this intricate lattice patterned shawl is hand knit  in a  luxury thick & thin ultra-soft wool with amazing fringe detail.  this stand out piece is  enormously versatile & can be worn as a shawl, scarf, cowl & hooded accessory.

◊ entirely hand knit & hand worked, each piece is one of a kind 
◊ limited edition item & design
◊ Argentina sourced fair trade wool, hand spun thick & thin, naturally dyed

available colours 
natural / black /variegated grey
*colour availability is always limited & may be discontinued at any time

about the wool: this fair trade thick & thin hand spun wool is from a women's collective in Argentina, all naturally dyed. 

entirely hand knit by tara-lynn in canada



all designs & patterns are original to ©good night, day

name: DIY JARVIS FISHERMAN RIBBED TOQUE "KNITTING KIT" W/ FAIR TRADE SOUTH AMERICAN WOOL
description:
"good night, day : modern & minimalist knitting kit" 
includes originaly designed knitting patterns by tara-lynn morrison 
& fair trade south american wool, as used for the ready made good night, day hand knits

◊ includes colour pamphlet with complete easy to follow good night day knitting instructions 
instructions, with photos 
◊ fair trade south american sourced wool, including pure merino wool, silk+alapca+merino blends, of many colour options 
◊ includes selection of good night day's signature knitting patterns; jarvis toque, windsor headband, simcoe braided headband, elora toque, leeds halter, petawawa cable toque, 
& more to come 
◊ individually hand packed in recylable large kraft bags, 
decorated with b&w bakers twine & branded with good ngiht day 
sticker & info 
◊ printed and self-published locally in Canada

photos: arden wray 
http://ardenwray.com 
model: elspeth hudson 
clothing provided by robber

© 2013 tara-lynn morrison & good night, day 
all rights reserved. reproduction in whole or any part of all material, including photos, in this booklet is strictly forbidden. 
the patterns/designs in this booklet are copyrighted and must not be knitted for re-sale. reproduction of this publication is protected by copyright and is sold in the condition that it is used for non commercial purposes.

the Leeds halter is a modern & versatile as a layering piece or a stand out piece on its own. The halter  has self-tie straps, with ribbing, a modest halter design, & the natural fibers allow for stretch, is not itchy,& allows the skin to breath.
